project.name: research
project.description: The research project researches how the desktop can be improved

longdescription.p: The desktop research project is not intended to maintain or manage existing ebuilds/features, but to research how existing features can be improved, or corrected, to work better with other components, to enhance the desktop experience.

project.goals: Desktop Gentoo's purpose is to improve Gentoo desktop experience, by researching how existing features can be improved or corrected, by trying to make desktop components work better together, and by eventually developping new components. This project is intended to be a team of gentoo developpers, spending their time in auditing the Gentoo desktop experience in a general manner, to find places wher it can be improved. Each time things can be improved, a corresponding task is designed and planed.
